departmentstorepkg
Class EmployeeIO

java.lang.Object
  departmentstorepkg.EmployeeIO

public class EmployeeIO
extends java.lang.Object

Class that provides an iterator type interface for files containing information about employee objects

Version:
1.0

Constructor Summary

          Initializes a newly-created EmployeeIO object

 boolean hasNext()
          returns true if there is another employee to be read from the file

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

EmployeeIO

public EmployeeIO(java.lang.String filename)
Initializes a newly-created EmployeeIO object

Parameters:
filename - Name of a text file containing ascii representations of employees.

Each employee is represented by six lines of text: 
   type (x, X, e, E, h, H)

   name

   address

   telephone number

   social security number

   pay

For example: 
   x 

   Mary Jones

   123 Main Line

   555-0469

   123-45-6789

   1923.07

represents an executive named Mary Jones.
Method Detail

hasNext

public boolean hasNext()
returns true if there is another employee to be read from the file

Returns:
true if another employee can be read from the file or
false if at the end of the file or an error occurred

next

public Employee next()
returns an Employee (or one of its subclasses) constructed from the information about the next employee in the file

Returns:
next Employee object in the file

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
returns a String representation of EmployeeIO

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
String containing information about the file
